item.title: CVE-2023-26531|2024-07-08T08:55:36.709Z -- %E9%97%AA%E7%94%B5%E5%8D%9A -- %E5%A4%9A%E5%90%88%E4%B8%80%E6%90%9C%E7%B4%A2%E8%87%AA%E5%8A%A8%E6%8E%A8%E9%80%81%E7%AE%A1%E7%90%86%E6%8F%92%E4%BB%B6-%E6%94%AF%E6%8C%81baidu%2Fgoogle%2Fbing%2Findexnow%2Fyandex%2F%E5%A4%B4%E6%9D%A1
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in 闪电博 多合一搜索自动推送管理插件-支持Baidu/Google/Bing/IndexNow/Yandex/头条 allows Cross Site Request Forgery.This issue affects 多合一搜索自动推送管理插件-支持Baidu/Google/Bing/IndexNow/Yandex/头条: from n/a through 4.2.7.
